titleStmt.title: The meritorious price of mans redemption, or, Christs satisfaction discussed and explained ... by William Pynchon ...
Meritorious price of mans redemption
titleStmt.author: Pynchon, William, 1590-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.I. for Thom. Newberry ...,

notesStmt.note: A reply to John Norton's "A discussion of that great point in divinity the sufferings of Christ" (q.v.).
Published also with title: A farther discussion of that great point in divinity ...
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
